locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped here for a quick shower before heading to the airport ‚Äî the place was very clean, and everything was well maintained. Plenty of open pumps and no wait for the showers. I‚Äôve consistently had great experiences at Love‚Äôs, and this stop ‚Ä¶
Clean towels in shower but yet floor and shower were dirty..also had a toilet that hadn't been cleaned..im always worried about catching something even with shower shoes on..just a pet peeve of mine.

Limited in food, and the water pressure in the showers are extremely low, and  the shower towels felt wet. They could have used a few more minutes in the dryer , I‚Äôm surprised because loves usually has everything. And they are very neat ‚Ä¶

Worst loves stop! Continuously disappointing. First time the shower no towels and was dirty. Second time the janitor banged and opened the door ! No waiting for someone to say hey still here getting dressed or using the bathroom! Was joking ‚Ä¶
Good truck parking..nasty showers..dirty floors..workers do not mop floors. Luke warm showers water!! Blood on the shower walls
We were pleased! Good truck parking.  Shower was clean.
Only 4 showers got here nobody in line for a shower and waited over an hour but a really nice and new

locations.title: Road Ranger
locations.content: Road Ranger may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Lots of stations for cars and big rigs. Inside the restrioms are very clean. They even have shower facilities! Lots of options for fountain drinks, snacks and coffee. Also has a Subway inside Very nice pitstop!

For as long as this truck stop has existed in this location you could fuel up and get a free shower with the presentation of your fuel receipt to the clerk. Apparently that policy has changed. I presented my receipt to the clerk for a free ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ opened. I love everything about this truck stop from quick access to fuel,parking availability,quick shower if you want to one to the best customer service like GEORGE AND JUSTINE two of the best customer service I have seen. But I ‚Ä¶

Got a shower here just to go in to notice there's no towels look like the shower with freshly used not wipe down or cleaned cashier she just gave me a towel not a washcloth or a bath mat shower still hair on the edges and a used washcloth ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Dealer
locations.content: Pilot Dealer may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ You can use your pilot rewards for showers, but showers are only available from 7 am to 10 pm.  They give you a key to the shower but you have to leave your keys or I.D. With them to insure they get their bathroom key back. They do not do ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Store and Fuel Islands. Location is good but not convenient. I came here to get a shower at 5 am, but it's chained/ locked, nobody inside Website says Open 24 hours, but they not, I never saw this kind of situation on a Pilot Truck Stop

‚Ä¶ truck stop for now on . How ridiculous is to not get a shower at 3am when they are try to end their day and relax but get told no they can't shower till 7am because they don't want to clean at night . Also they lock the back doors for ‚Ä¶
Out of all the pilots i have been to this one by far is my fav! Its not your cookie cutter gas station. Awesome drink selection and clean nice shower.

Don't come here. The attitude towards drivers is terrible. The shower is closed in the evening. Accordingly, this is important for a driver who has been working all day. I won't be coming here anymore.

‚Ä¶ stop closes the amenities for truck drivers because they don‚Äôt want to clean after 9p.m. Better off staying in Edinburg or in Harlingen don‚Äôt recommend coming here. Arrived and asked for a shower at 8:50 and they refused to sell a shower.
‚Ä¶ Stopped to shower and i was the only one there. Never heard of a pilot closing at 10. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ clean and very organized.  Nothing appeared to be out of place. I got me a shower and I was impressed with the showers. They were very clean compared to other actual Pilot/Flying J's across the United States. They do have semi truck ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Pilot) I have ever visited in the 26 years I've been driving trucks. I went to it initially to take a shower and the pressure was extremely low, but I needed one. When I finished I filled up my thermos with only ice and I was charged ‚Ä¶

Facilities are new and very neat, it really impressed me how clean they keep it, restrooms, showers, parking, it‚Äôs all very clean. I hope we drivers help keeping it that way. Wendy‚Äôs and Go Loco (street tacos and burritos, will open on 10/ ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: 2 guests ahead Of me for shower and waiting 2+ hours. Still 2 guests ahead of me. Also don‚Äôt park on reserved parking even on daytime. There is no humanity in this truck stop and manager. Came here 6:30am parked on reserved parking, because ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I used shower #6. Wasn't super clean. üíÅüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I've been in worst, so it wasn't too bad and that isn't the worst part, thankfully. üòÆ‚Äçüí® ‚Ä¶
Clean restroom,  clean bathroom and good shower everything working , I  Recommend this Pilot..

Jessica the so called manager harassing my family and I for taking a shower just because we needed to go in and out a few times üòïüëéüèºüò† I will be calling Corporate and explaining the Whole situation on this girl. Go worry about more important ‚Ä¶

Once again, Flying J cares nothing about the drivers. Stopped in to get a shower. I was the next one available.  Two people left showers as I was sitting down. 30 mins later no showers cleaned. When I asked, manager said he sent them out to ‚Ä¶
Don't pay for a shower at this place. They won't tell you there is a three hour wait,then when you ask for your money back they will refund it to your card then charge you for another one.
A lot of empty showers and no one is cleaning them ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è and to top it off 12 people in line actually waiting on them like drivers have to be able to get a shower and go ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ was told no they do not give change .  It's not like they don't get the quarters back out of the laundry machines. We as drivers need to be able to do  laundry, shower and eat unfortunately flying J don't give 2 rats  about us driversü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ ‚Ä¶

Went to this storewxtra instead of staying at the little mom &pop gas station as I wanted to have a shower this evening, a coffee and fuel in the morning.  Well the shower system w as down and wouldn't give the code to get into the showers ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ programs have no funds, or full. Personal hygiene has become difficult came to Flying J's shower 18. did not have enough and young lady Alieda took the incitive to see if customer's had a shower. Kindness and Humanity still exist thank you ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: It's a good T-A. I just popped in to use the restroom, get something to eat and drink. The man at the counter was super nice and helpful. I think it's one of the farthest south T-As that I have ever been to. Just was in a hurry and didn't have time to get a shower or go to the restaurant. Wish I could have had more time.

Showers are the worst I‚Äôve seen . Mildew everywhere. I couldn‚Äôt stop coughing while in the shower. After I left I had a headache for about 20 minutes. Very unhealthy to breathe. As a person that survived pneumonia I was very worried and scared.
